body.section: Hierarchy VictimOfAbuseOrNeglectRecord is a kind of HistoryOfAbuseOrNeglectRecord(Abstract)

ul.li: VictimOfIntimatePartnerOrDomesticViolence is a kind of VictimOfAbuseOrNeglectRecord

section.title: Description
section.p: This class is used to record the details of a history of abuse perpetrated by others. The client/patient, as victim of abuse or neglect, may have additional forensic tests (e.g. imaging, lab) and medications. Therefore this specialization class has associations to medication, diagnostic imaging, and laboratory results.

stentry.p: This attribute specifies the type of victim or abuse or neglect using a standard coding system.
If the record contains references to specific medication associated with the abuse, this association will provide the supporting information.
